alert.note: Alert for Baraga; Iron (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 16 at 4:00AM EDT until April 17 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM EDT /4 PM CDT/ THIS AFTERNOON TO 8 PM EDT /7 PM CDT/ MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow and mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Baraga and Iron Counties. * WHEN...From 5 PM EDT /4 PM CDT/ this afternoon to 8 PM EDT /7 PM CDT/ Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The combination of gusty winds and heavy, wet snow accumulations will lead to an increased risk for downed tree limbs and power outages.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
